TopicTitle: [0.22] Kerbal Maps: Web maps of all bodies. Biomes and text info. (v0.11 Oct 8)

Articles.Content: Oooh this is nice.

This is amazing.

I love it!
This plugin looks very interesting to me. Can it generate height maps and unshaded color maps? I would like to get as high res maps as I can for some 3d renderings.

Leaflet plugin source released.

This plugin looks very interesting to me. Can it generate height maps and unshaded color maps? I would like to get as high res maps as I can for some 3d renderings.

Yes, it can generate height maps at any arbitrary resolution and unshaded color maps at 10k x 5k. Releasing the map generator plugin is next on my list.

Edited May 14, 2013 by saik0

Hey Saik0,

Everything is looking absolutely amazing. Good to see you have a github made for the source. I look forward to seeing how you're going about generating the maps.

Warm Regards,

Joe

Duna and Ike added to the maps. Huzzah!

Edit: I visited the -0.0005, -31.8825 'fourth anomaly' on Duna, there did not appear to be anything on, under, or above the terrain, so I've removed it from the map until there is some evidence something is there.

Then it may be an Win 8 problem. I run Chrome on Win 8.

As of version 0.4 all celestial bodies with a surface have been mapped. Just in time for 0.20. Now, go plant those flags!

What about Jool?
Is there a way to save the web app to my computer? This is amazing!

What about Jool?

Not sure where you got that image, exported from the game resources or user created? In any case I cant get Jool or Sun maps form the API with neither the CreateMaps function, nor can I get surface data for them. It's unlikely they will be mapped by the project if it cant be done programatically.

Is there a way to save the web app to my computer? This is amazing!

Not at this time. The source is available but getting all the map tiles is non-trivial. It's 122850 pngs totaling about 1.7GB.
Thank you for your hard work on this project, I'll rep you as soon as I get on a regular computer

AWESOME just AWESOME thanks...

Hi,

Is there a plugin that allows positional data to be transferred say from telemachus for anyones satellites? I saw a picture of one somewhere - maybe in this thread.

I would wish it to work such that only selected clients or such so as to filter the data when accessing the site.

Also sounds tho as in doing this would require bandwidth useage. (I am just now lookin at telemachus - finally...after updating my mods to 20.2 ...hours of work just updating)

Cdr Zeta

Yeah, Rich has integrated kerbalmaps into Telemachus dev builds. I've considered writing an in game client that uploads all craft position/velocity to kerbalmaps, allowing users to visualize their own savegames, and share them with others. I made the maps for fun, so far there's been plenty of low hanging fruit to pick. A feature like that requires considerably more effort with less visible results. I'm not yet convinced that's something I want to do.

Can you add a feature where it will highlight in red (or green for Duna) where Kethane reserves are?

It's different for every savegame, and we'd need to first get the data into a format Leaflet is familiar with. GeoJSON looks promising.

hey, I dont want to be picky, because your maps are AWESOME!!!!, but is there a way to export your maps that goes a little bit faster then grid for grid? I want to do some wiki work, but I need the maps and the ability to draw on them. I looked around but couldnt find anyone with an answer to my question, so if I clearly missed it, just slap me on the face.

I've been meaning to make the map data public but whenever I have time to work on the project I usually spend it working on new features and squashing bugs, if only because it's more interesting. Soon
